biotools.summary: This software provides easy access to cancer data from the National Cancer Institute’s CPTAC program, which characterizes and studies the proteogenomic landscape of tumors. We implement the software as a Python package called cptac, but you can seamlessly use it in an R environment with the help of the reticulate package (demonstrated in Tutorial 6). Our package is installed in one step with pip:.

bioschemas.name: CPTAC
